text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One day, while training with Super<n>Creek as usual...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff. Phew...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
The new training plan is great! It's<n>much easier on my legs
too.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you did such a good job! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Creek continues to show<n>improvement. She's hitting her
daily<n>targets without a hitch.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: So next on the list is a light sprint on<n>the dirt track, right?

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
How do you ever expect Super Creek<n>to debut with that
laughably meager<n>training regimen?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We both turn to face the veteran<n>trainer who attempted to
scout Creek<n>at the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
If only you had chosen me, then you<n>would've debuted a
long time ago.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... But I think that my trainer's<n>plans are very well
made.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text: You vastly overestimate the ability ofthis rookie. ...I should show you whata real trainer can do.
choice_data_list: And what do you mean by that?

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I suggest that we hold a scrimmage<n>between our racers to
show which of<n>us is more capable of developing<n>talent.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I presume you'll accept the<n>challenge... That is if you truly
believe<n>you're the best fit for Super Creek.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh dear, what should we do...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's true that I'm just a new trainer,<n>but I know that I'm
more determined<n>than anyone else to support Creek.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If anyone's going to help her reach<n>the top, it's going to be
me!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh my, Trainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
It's only natural that trainers are<n>proud of our trainees, and
are willing<n>to do whatever it takes to help them<n>reach their
full potential.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
We believe that they deserve to work<n>only with the best.
Which means that if<n>I win, you'll hand over Super Creek<n>
to me, correct?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wait, I might lose her?! If that's part<n>of the deal, then I can't
accep—

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Of course, that's fine with me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Is she serious?! How could she just<n>accept those
conditions?

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I didn't think you'd be the one to<n>agree. Perhaps you admit
that joining<n>me is the best option.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
No, you must be mistaken. I don't<n>plan on losing at all, not
one bit.

text_block_list.name: First-rate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Heh, it doesn't matter though—you'll<n>be transferring to my
team soon<n>enough.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And with that, the veteran trainer<n>takes his leave.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Well, we better train hard then!
choice_data_list: Why did you agree to that?!
Why did you agree to that?!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Well, you accepted his challenge<n>because you believe that
you're the<n>right trainer for me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
It made me so happy to hear that you<n>want to help me
become my best. ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
That's why there's nothing to worry<n>about at all. I'll make
sure that<n>everything's going to be all right.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's always taking my feelings into<n>consideration.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So in order to show my appreciation,<n>there's only one thing
left to do—I<n>gotta prove that I'm the only trainer<n>for her!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Basically, ya guys want me to help<n>out with the trainin' and
stuff?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, that's right. It was my<n>trainer's idea. We agree that it
would<n>be good to practice with the same<n>conditions as the
scrimmage.
choice_data_list:
She chose to put her trust in me. Now it's my
turn to prove myself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Nah, I think she's just tryin' to spoil<n>you again.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But whatever, it's all good. Besides,any sleazeball trainer who uses hisown trainee in a bet and tries tosteal my girl like that needs to betaught a painful lesson, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Thanks, Tamtam! You're such a good<n>girl.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Ya tryin' to pat my head again?!<n>Get ya hands away
from me! I'm not<n>a kid anymore!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ah! Come back, Tamtam!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, our preparations for the<n>match against the veteran
trainer and<n>his racer begin.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Good work today, Trainer. Looks like<n>tomorrow's the day of
the race.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, don't worry... We'll be just<n>fine. ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
...Do you remember what Tamtam<n>said? That I like to spoil
people?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But the truth is... I just want to make<n>others smile, whether
it's the kids at<n>the day care or you...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I perform my best when I'm taking<n>care of those around
me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
So it doesn't matter if you're a<n>rookie—I believe in your
skills, and you<n>can count on me to prove it to<n>everyone.
